On Sep 22, 2012, at 10:23 AM, Andrei Neculau wrote:

> 
> If you think tha=
t bookmarking is not coupling (client and server are free from each other),=
 then why this topic altogether?

Because I was wondering, whether a server=
 had a chance to know what URIs a client considers bookmarkable (because it=
's up to the client to make that decision).

Mark's reply was spot on: look=
 at access.log
